quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易混淆“continually”（频繁重复，有间隔）与形近词“continuously”（连续无间隔）的含义，或误将其理解为“单纯继续地”而忽略“反复”特征。
quiz_item.sentence: She **continually** checks her email throughout the day, even during meetings—she can't seem to focus on anything else for long.

option.definition: 频繁地；不断地（强调重复发生）
继续地（强调动作持续不中断）
